title: Sleazy Business: A Pictorial History of Exploitation Tabloids
description: Everyone's seen the National Enquirer--but did you know that the Enquirer's roots are in sex, gore, and sensationalism? Sleazy Business is the pictorial history of these publications, and gathered in its pages are some one hundred twenty examples of outrageousness which will leave you surprised, laughing, and yes, even shocked.
author: Alan Betrock
